name: Things Get Dicey
description:
**[Zoom Out to 50%]**

A 2D Platformer where you play as a dice where it experiences physics changes at regular time intervals. You can slow down,  speed up, have low, high or inverted  gravity or can even stick to walls ! The RNG keeps you on your feet dreading the next combination of physics changes ! Instructions:

Physics changes occur every 5 seconds.

You can double jump as long as you can touch a wall or ground after every double jump.

Controls:
  • A (or Left Arrow) To Move Left
  • D (or Right Arrow) To Move Right
  • Space To Jump, 
  • Esc or P to Pause.

(Please Play At 50% Zoom)

Sorry about the inconvenience !
